page.title: 14Stalls in a Market
page.content: A market is a place where traders sell their goods. They move to different places each day. They come to us on a Friday.In the market there are lots of different types of stalls. There were lots of popular stalls and some unpopular stalls. The popular stalls are: clothes, make-up, meat and pie van, jewellery, fish'n'chips, hot-dog van and fish. The unpopular stalls are: sheets and quilts and material and a couple more. There are lots of different types of stalls. There is music blasting out of the speakers on one of the jeans stalls. The stalls are all different colours. The stallholders are mostly Pakistani people. There are a couple of Indian people and a couple of English.Lots of them are friendly and patient. People go to a market to find good bargains. { }
